data.title: Department of Enterprise Services (DES)
data.meta_description: To connect the design and construction community with education opportunities, including alternative public works contracting, to enhance industry knowledge, quality and efficiency towards successful outcomes. An ad hoc committee of the Capital Projects Advisory Review Board (CPARB).
data.text:
To connect the design and construction community with education opportunities, including alternative public works contracting, to enhance industry knowledge, quality and efficiency towards successful outcomes. An ad hoc committee of the Capital Projects Advisory Review Board (CPARB).
